body.name: Dream On Me Aden 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib In Cherry, Greenguard Gold Certified, Non-Toxic Finish, New Zealand Pinewood, With 3 Mattress Height Settings

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Dream On Me Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 3 hrs 58 mins
features: LONG LASTING - Made of New Zealand pinewood, the Aden 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib is both durable and stylish. A clean design and small footprint allow it to fit into any nursery theme. All tools for assembly are included

4-in-1 CONVERTIBILITY OPTIONS - The Aden grows along with your child . You can convert the crib into a mini daybed and a twin size bed and it has a convenient 3-position mattress support system (Twin Size Rail and Bed frame sold separately)

YOUR SAFETY MATTERS - The Aden 4-in-1 is JPMA Certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC and ASTM. All of our products are tested by 3rd party labs for lead and other toxic elements. The cribs features beautiful non-toxic, child-safe, water-based finishes

SMALL WONDER - Compact dimensions mean the Aden occupies a small footprint. But internally it is very spacious, making it ideal for small nurseries, co-sharing or when you have multiple kids to tend to
MATTRESS COMPATIBILITY - Comes with 1 OEM Mattress pad. For additional aftermarket mattress purchase, we recommend any Dream On Me, non-toxic, Greenguard certified mini crib mattress
body.description: The Dream On Me Aden Convertible 4-in-1 Mini Crib is a marvellous blend of style and substance. Made of New Zealand pinewood, its robust build, solid frame and strict adherence to safety standards are a testament to its durability, while its clean lines and a variety of available finishes in water based paints to highlight its style quotient. Its utility is undeniable - it sits low on the floor making it easy to reach your baby and has a convenient 3-position, adjustable mattress support system. Its small size makes it ideal for a small nursery, when you are co-sharing, or have multiple babies to tend to! It meets the growing needs of your child - convert it from a crib to mini daybed and twin-size bed. It has a stationary (non-drop side) rail design, which provides the utmost in product safety. All Dream On Me cribs are designed with a focus on safety, are JPMA certified and meet all applicable ASTM and CPSC standards. All tools for assembly are included and we recommend the Dream On Me non-toxic, Greenguard Gold certified mini or portable crib mattress for the perfect fit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Aden 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib - For small spaces and big dreams! Our popular Aden 4-in-1 Convertible Mini Crib is the perfect choice for a small nursery when you are co-sharing your room with a baby or for parents of multiples. The Aden occupies a small footprint but offers plenty of space for your baby and long term convertibility. A win-win for everyone!

Adjustable Mattress Height Designed to accommodate your growing child, this crib features a Four-position mattress height setting that can be adjusted as your baby grows up Made of Solid Pinewood Made of superior quality pinewood, this mini crib a minimalist design that allows it to fit in seamlessly with any decor Non-Toxic Finishes The Aden is available in a range of stunning non-toxic, baby-safe finishes. The crib meets or exceeds all safety regulatory standards. Tested and Trusted This crib is JPMA Certified to meet or exceed all safety standards set by the CPSC & ASTM. Rest assured, safety is and always be our No.1 priority.
Creative nursery solutions by our Dream On Me moms!

Other popular Dream On Me mini cribs to consider. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for what we needed
reviews.reviewText: This mini crib is cute, fit together well and had all the parts. Not really high quality wood, but we knew that before we bought. Color is spot on from the picture and seems sturdy. Using this instead of a bassinet for our newborn, I love the extra protection it provides compared to a bassinet with out the bulk of a full size crib. Love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was able to put it together myself. I got the cherry wood color. It’s a beautiful color. It fits perfectly where I measured before I bought it. I am happy with my purchase. The only thing was the mattress pad is super thin so I bought a separate mattress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too small but beautiful crib
reviews.reviewText: A little too small for my granddaughter but wow what a beautiful mini crib! The wood is gorgeous and it is very solid! I was bummed it didn’t work out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't hesitate to buy
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the cherry finish crib, came in thr box without any damage, all the parts and instruction booklet inside. I love this crib due to small spacing in our home and absolutely love it, fits perfectly. And, easy to put together with some help from my mother in law! I also purchased the dream on me mattress and it fits perfectly as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little crib for the price!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our little one in hopes that it would fit in the narrow space we have between windows - and it did. It's not the highest quality crib but it certainly will do for an infant/toddler. We chose this particular brand because unlike other mini cribs, it converts to a toddler day bed without having to rig something or buy additional parts (although it does not include a toddler bed rail). We also like the idea of being able to use it for a twin, should we choose to buy the twin from set.The crib did arrive with a few MINOR scratches which wouldn't have been noticeable if we'd ordered it in french white but because it's a for pine and we ordered Cherry - your eye is drawn to them. I doubt this crib will escape it's purpose without further dings - so there's now point in sending it back. Assembly was easy and once together it's a rather sturdy little piece.We had a hard time wrapping our brain around the size of a mini crib, so I've included a photo of it with a boppy pillow in it. I've also included a picture of the crib with the mattress pad it arrived with (we've ordered another mattress, but it it hasn't arrived yet). I will say, this crib seems to be great value for money!Update: Our now 17 month old who is in the 90th lercentile for height, loves this mini crib. It is sturdy, and he continues to sleep comfortably in it. I’m not sure it will be long enough to use as a toddler bed but we can easily transition to a twin bed if need be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully made, perfect for small spaces.
reviews.reviewText: I love that it's perfect for small places. It's very very well made very stardy and it's beautiful. I purchased this for my grandson, my son is recently divorced and my youngest grandbaby wasn't sleeping very well in the pack n p!at while at his daddies new house where space is limited. My grandsons bedroom at dads new house is smaller. This is a perfect solution. Just one tip please buy a mattress, the one included is very thin. I bought the dream on me 3 inch thick mattress made expressly for this line of mini cribs and it fit perfectly. I recommended this mini crib its budget friendly, well made in a variety of finishes and perfect for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Well Made
reviews.reviewText: This is obviously a comfy bed for my great grandson. It is a beautiful piece of furniture and is very sturdy and well made. It’s easy to assemble, but having four hands would make it even easier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product arrived damaged
reviews.reviewText: The box was completely fine and the packing is very secure so I'm am unsure how or at what point this happened. 1 star for now, because we urgently needed this. I work from home at night and my daughter just started sitting up and trying to pull herself out of her bassinet, which has already caused work issues. If I am able to contact the seller and get a replacement part, then I will update the review and stars. 2 stars because it is pretty...Update: we reached out to Dream On me, and though the process was somewhat redundant, it was fast. We were sent a replacement part and updated on the process along the way. The crib is gorgeous and fits in our room perfectly until we put our baby into her own room.
